creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: light gray color cube shaped vase; cross-shaped incisions on each of the 4 sides; incision edges flare outward slightly at the center of each cross; square mouth at top; rough and uneven texture; interior glaze is light brown/dark brown mottled with celadon at basin; natural color cube shaped wooden box with lid, marigold color cloth wrap, olive green and white stripe tie for box
inscription: lid verso: 石釉〇花瓶; lid recto: 五郎造 and red seal
signed: incised mark on bottom at center
title: Square shaped vase
